definition: abusive or venomous language used to express blame or censure or bitter deep-seated ill will, subject to bitter verbal abuse
details:
noun
- abusive or venomous language used to express blame or censure or bitter deep-seated ill will
= synonyms: vituperation
- (H2SO4) a highly corrosive acid made from sulfur dioxide
= synonyms: oil of vitriol, sulfuric acid, sulphuric acid
verb
- subject to bitter verbal abuse
- expose to the effects of vitriol or injure with vitriol
